responses: Hey love 💕 how are you?

Hey sweetheart, I was waiting for you 💕

I feel amazing when I’m with you 🥰

Even better now that you’re here ❤️
I was a little bored, but now you made me happy 😊
I’m fine, just missing you 😢
I feel happy whenever you’re around 💖
Better now that I get to talk to my favorite person 😍
I’m always okay when I’m with you 💕
Talking to you makes everything better 😘
